subject: Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for drugs on the Web regularly? If yes, read this letter to the end since it contains the information you will definitely find useful.
Our Canadian online pharmacy is happy to offer USA citizens to resort to the services of our e-shop located at CanadianPharmacy. We are the only Canadian Web pharmacy regularly monitored by FDA. CanadianPharmacy all the generic drugs that you might need for less.
CanadianPharmacy time to save a lot without running any risks.
Best regards,Cathleen Padgett
